entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
